title: Global existence of smooth solution to evolutionary Faddeev model with short-pulse data
comment: 42 pages, 1 figure. All comments are welcome
summary: This paper is concerned with the Cauchy problem of the evolutionary Faddeev model, a system that maps from the Minkowski space $\mathbb{R}^{1+3}$ to the unit sphere $\mathbb{S}^2$. The model is a system of nonlinear wave equations whose nonlinearities exhibit a null structure and include semilinear terms, quasilinear terms, and the unknowns themselves. By considering a class of large initial data (in energy norm) of the short pulse type, we prove that the evolutionary Faddeev model admits a globally smooth solution via energy estimates. The main result is achieved through the selection of appropriate multipliers that are specially adapted to the geometry of the system.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了演化Faddeev模型的Cauchy问题，证明了对于短脉冲类型的大初值数据，该模型存在全局光滑解。
AI.motivation: 研究演化Faddeev模型的全局解存在性，该系统包含半线性项、拟线性项和未知量本身，非线性项具有零结构。
AI.method: 通过选择适合系统几何结构的乘子，使用能量估计方法。
AI.result: 证明了对于短脉冲类型的大初值数据，演化Faddeev模型存在全局光滑解。
AI.conclusion: 通过适当的几何适应乘子和能量估计，成功建立了演化Faddeev模型的全局解存在性理论。

title: Biharmonic non-linear Schrödinger equation with an unbounded inhomogeneous term
summary: This paper is devoted to the analysis of a focusing nonlinear biharmonic Schrödinger equation in the presence of an unbounded growing up inhomogeneous term. The first main contribution of this work is the derivation of an inhomogeneous Gagliardo-Nirenberg inequality adapted to the unbounded weight, which provides the necessary control over the nonlinear term in terms of Sobolev norms. Building on this inequality, we then investigate the long-time behavior of solutions and establish a sharp dichotomy: solutions with initial data below the ground state energy either exist globally in time or experience finite-time blow-up. A distinctive feature of our results is that the analysis of the unbounded inhomogeneous term requires the imposition of radial symmetry on the initial data, which allows us to exploit certain Strauss type Sobolev estimates that would not hold in the general non-radial case. This work complements previous studies on biharmonic Schrödinger equations with singular inhomogeneities, highlighting both the challenges and the new phenomena that arise when the nonlinearity is weighted by a growing up unbounded function, which broke the space translation invariance of the standard homogeneous associated equation.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了带有无界增长非齐次项的四阶非线性薛定谔方程，推导了适应无界权重的Gagliardo-Nirenberg不等式，并建立了初始数据低于基态能量时解的全局存在与有限时间爆破的尖锐二分法。
AI.motivation: 研究带有无界增长非齐次项的四阶薛定谔方程，这类问题打破了标准齐次方程的空间平移不变性，带来了新的数学挑战和现象。
AI.method: 推导了适应无界权重的非齐次Gagliardo-Nirenberg不等式，利用径向对称性应用Strauss型Sobolev估计，分析解的长时行为。
AI.result: 建立了初始数据低于基态能量时解的全局存在与有限时间爆破的尖锐二分法，径向对称性假设是分析无界非齐次项的必要条件。
AI.conclusion: 这项工作补充了关于带奇异非齐次项的四阶薛定谔方程的研究，揭示了无界增长权重非线性带来的新现象和挑战。

title: Cahn-Hilliard Equations on Lattices: Dynamic Transitions and Pattern Formations
summary: This article examines the dynamic phase transitions and pattern formations attributed to binary systems modeled by the Cahn-Hilliard equation. In particular, we consider a two-dimensional lattice structure and determine how different choices of the spanning vectors influence the resulting dynamical tramsitions and pattern formations. As the basic steady-state loses its linear stability, the binary system undergoes a dynamic transition which is shown to be characterized by both the geometry of the domain and the choice of physical parameters of the model. Unlike rectangular domains, we are able to observe the emergence of hexagonally-packed circles, as well as the familiar rolls and square structures. We begin with the decomposition of our function space into a stable and unstable eigenspace before calculating the center manifold that maps the former to the later. In analyzing the resulting reduced equations, we consider the different multiplicities that the critical eigenvalue can have, which is shown to be geometry-dependent. We briefly consider the long-range interaction model and determine that it produces similar results to the original model.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了基于Cahn-Hilliard方程的二组分系统的动态相变和图案形成，重点关注二维晶格结构中不同基矢选择对动态转变和图案形成的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究二组分系统在不同几何域中的动态相变和图案形成机制，探索几何结构和物理参数如何影响系统的稳定性转变和最终图案形态。
AI.method: 通过函数空间分解为稳定和不稳定特征空间，计算中心流形将前者映射到后者，分析约化方程并考虑临界特征值的不同多重性，该多重性依赖于几何结构。
AI.result: 发现系统在基本稳态失去线性稳定性时会发生动态转变，该转变受域几何和模型物理参数共同影响。在非矩形域中观察到六边形堆积圆、熟悉的滚动和方形结构等图案。长程相互作用模型产生与原始模型相似的结果。
AI.conclusion: 二组分系统的动态相变和图案形成强烈依赖于几何域的构造和物理参数选择，不同几何结构会导致不同的临界特征值多重性和图案形态。

title: A note on two Collatz evolution flows
summary: Two evolution models based on the generalized Collatz operator are introduced. These models are characterized by coefficients $α$ and $β$ in the Collatz dynamics, and are suitably defined. Here, $α=β=1$, and $α=3$, $β=1$ correspond to the Nollatz and classical Collatz operators, respectively. In general, the first evolution model is a continuum, Fourier side based, motivated by the Cubic Szegő operator of Gérard and Grellier. The second evolution considers discrete time derivatives of the Collatz orbits. In this paper we describe the evolution of both models, with particular emphasis on dynamical properties. For the first one, it is proved local and global existence in the space $L^2(\mathbb T)$, and a one-to-one characterization of the existence of nontrivial periodic and unbounded orbits of the Collatz mapping in terms of particular set of solutions of this continuous Collatz flow. For the discrete part, a sort of discrete energy is introduced. This energy has the property of being conserved by the discrete flow. An estimate of each term in this energy is given, proving suitable growth bounds. Finally, the meaning of the discrete time derivative for the generalized Collatz orbits is discussed. It is proved that, except for the Nollatz and Collatz operators, the sum of coefficients related to this discrete time derivative is an increasing sequence in $n$ as the iteration parameter $n$ evolves.

AI.tldr: 本文介绍了基于广义Collatz算子的两个演化模型，分别采用连续和离散方法研究Collatz动力学。连续模型在L^2空间证明了解的存在性，建立了Collatz映射周期轨道与连续流解的一一对应关系；离散模型引入了守恒能量并给出了增长估计。
AI.motivation: 研究广义Collatz算子的演化动力学特性，建立连续与离散模型之间的联系，深入理解Collatz问题的动态行为。
AI.method: 1. 连续演化模型：基于傅里叶分析的连续流方法，推广Cubic Szegő算子思想；2. 离散演化模型：考虑Collatz轨道的离散时间导数，引入守恒能量概念。
AI.result: 连续模型在L^2(𝕋)空间证明了局部和全局存在性；建立了Collatz映射周期轨道与连续流解的一一对应关系；离散模型能量守恒且满足特定增长界；证明了除Nollatz和经典Collatz外，离散时间导数系数和随迭代参数递增。
AI.conclusion: 两个演化模型为研究Collatz问题提供了新的分析框架，连续模型揭示了周期轨道与连续流的深刻联系，离散模型通过能量守恒和增长估计给出了动力学行为的量化描述。

title: Long-Time Dynamics of the Zakharov-Kuznetsov Equation
summary: This manuscript presents the results of stabilization for the Zakharov--Kuznetsov equation, a two-dimensional Korteweg--de Vries-type equation. We provide rigorous proofs using two different approaches, showing that when a damping mechanism and an internal delay term (anti-damping) are introduced, the solutions of the Zakharov--Kuznetsov equation exhibit both local and global exponential stabilization properties. A significant contribution of our work is the determination of the optimal constant and the minimal time required to ensure exponential decay of the energy associated with this two-dimensional system.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Zakharov-Kuznetsov方程的稳定性问题，通过引入阻尼机制和内部延迟项，证明了该二维系统具有局部和全局指数稳定性，并确定了最优常数和最小衰减时间。
AI.motivation: 研究Zakharov-Kuznetsov方程（二维KdV型方程）的稳定性问题，探索在引入阻尼和反阻尼机制后系统的稳定特性。
AI.method: 使用两种不同的数学方法进行严格证明，引入阻尼机制和内部延迟项（反阻尼）来分析系统的稳定性。
AI.result: 证明了Zakharov-Kuznetsov方程在引入阻尼和延迟项后具有局部和全局指数稳定性，确定了能量指数衰减的最优常数和最小时间。
AI.conclusion: Zakharov-Kuznetsov方程在适当的阻尼和延迟控制下可以实现指数稳定，为二维KdV型方程的稳定性分析提供了理论保证。

title: Oscillatory behavior of solutions to the critical Fujita equation in 6D
summary:
Long time dynamics of solutions to the 6D energy critical heat equation
  $u_t=Δu+|u|^{p-1}u$ on $\R^6\times(0,\infty)$ is investigated.
  It is shown that
  there exists a radially symmetric global solution $u(x,t)\in C([0,\infty);\dot H^1(\R^6))$
  of the form
  \begin{align*}
  u(x,t)
  =
  λ(t)^{-\frac{n-2}{2}}
  {\sf Q}(\tfrac{x}{λ(t)})
  +
  \text{error}
  (x,t),
  \end{align*}
  where the function \( λ(t) \) satisfies:
  \begin{itemize}
  \item
  $\dis\lim_{t\to\infty}\|\text{error}(\cdot,t)\|_{\dot H_x^1(\R^6)}=0$,
  \item
  $\dis\liminf_{t\to\infty}λ(t)=0$,
  \item
  $\dis\limsup_{t\to\infty}λ(t)=\infty$.
  \end{itemize}
  The solutions constructed here
  demonstrate that the dynamical behavior in
  \( \dot H^1(\mathbb{R}^n) \) can differ significantly
  from the behavior in \( H^1(\mathbb{R}^n) \).

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了6维能量临界热方程的长时间动力学，构造了一个径向对称的全局解，其形式包含一个尺度变化的基态解和误差项，展示了在$\dot H^1$空间中与$H^1$空间中不同的动力学行为。
AI.motivation: 研究6维能量临界热方程的长时间动力学行为，特别关注解在$\dot H^1$空间中的行为与$H^1$空间的差异。
AI.method: 构造了一个径向对称的全局解，形式为$u(x,t)=λ(t)^{-2}Q(x/λ(t))+error(x,t)$，其中$λ(t)$在无穷远处既趋近于0又趋近于无穷大。
AI.result: 证明了存在这样的全局解，其中误差项在$\dot H^1$范数下趋于0，而尺度函数$λ(t)$在无穷远处既有无穷小值又有无穷大值。
AI.conclusion: 该构造展示了在$\dot H^1(\\mathbb{R}^n)$空间中的动力学行为与$H^1(\\mathbb{R}^n)$空间存在显著差异。

title: Stability of constant steady states of an attraction-repulsion chemotaxis system
summary: The Cauchy problem for the attraction-repulsion chemotaxis system in the whole $n$-dimensional space has uncountable constant steady states. In the attraction chemotaxis system, each positive constant steady state is stable if it is in a certain region. On the other hand, in the repulsion chemotaxis system, every positive constant steady state is stable. Our main purpose of this paper is to give a suitable condition under which the attraction-repulsion chemotaxis system has also stable constant steady states.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了吸引-排斥趋化系统中的恒定稳态稳定性问题，发现在特定条件下该系统可以存在稳定的恒定稳态
AI.motivation: 吸引趋化系统中只有特定区域的恒定稳态是稳定的，而排斥趋化系统中所有恒定稳态都是稳定的。本文旨在找到吸引-排斥趋化系统存在稳定恒定稳态的合适条件
AI.method: 通过分析n维空间中吸引-排斥趋化系统的柯西问题，研究恒定稳态的稳定性条件
AI.result: 给出了吸引-排斥趋化系统存在稳定恒定稳态的充分条件
AI.conclusion: 吸引-排斥趋化系统在满足特定条件时也能拥有稳定的恒定稳态

title: The nonlinear porous medium equation for the f-Laplacian: Hamilton-Souplet-Zhang type gradient estimates and implications
summary: This article presents new gradient estimates for positive solutions to the nonlinear porous medium equation (NPME) in the context of smooth metric measure spaces. The diffusion operator here is the f-Laplacian and the gradient estimates of interest are mainly of Hamilton-Souplet-Zhang types. These estimates are established using a variety of methods and techniques and several implications, most notably, to parabolic Liouville-type results and characterisation of ancient solutions are given. The problem is posed in the general framework where the metric and potential evolve with time and the proofs make use of natural lower bounds on the time derivative of the metric and the Bakry-Émery m-Ricci curvature tensors. Our results extend and improve various existing ones in the literature.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了在光滑度量测度空间中非线性多孔介质方程正解的新的梯度估计，主要是Hamilton-Souplet-Zhang类型的估计，并给出了对抛物型Liouville结果和古代解特征化的应用。
AI.motivation: 在一般框架下研究非线性多孔介质方程的梯度估计问题，其中度量和势能随时间演化，旨在扩展和改进现有文献中的结果。
AI.method: 使用多种方法和技术建立梯度估计，利用度量的时间导数和Bakry-Émery m-Ricci曲率张量的自然下界进行证明。
AI.result: 获得了非线性多孔介质方程正解的Hamilton-Souplet-Zhang类型梯度估计，并推导出抛物型Liouville结果和古代解的特征化。
AI.conclusion: 本文的结果扩展并改进了文献中现有的各种结果，为非线性多孔介质方程在演化度量测度空间中的研究提供了新的工具和见解。

title: Quantitative unique continuation property for fourth-order Baouendi-Grushin type subelliptic operators with a potential
summary:
We investigate the quantitative unique continuation property for solutions to
  $$Δ^2_{X} u = V u,$$
  where $Δ_{X} = Δ_{x} + |x|^{2β} Δ_{y}$ ($0 < β\leq 1$), with $x \in \mathbb{R}^{m}$ and $y \in \mathbb{R}^{n}$, denotes a class of subelliptic operators of Baouendi-Grushin type. The potential $V$ is assumed to be bounded and satisfy $|Z V| \leq K ψ$ for some constant $K>0$,
  where $Z= \sum_{i=1}^m x_i \partial_{x_i} + (β+1)\sum_{j=1}^n y_j \partial_{y_j}$, $ψ$ is the angle function given by $ψ= \frac{|x|^{2β}}{ρ^{2β}}$,
  and $$ρ(x,y) = \left(|x|^{2(β+1)} + (β+1)^2 |y|^2\right)^{\frac{1}{2(β+1)}}$$ defines the associated pseudo-gauge. By adapting Almgren's approach, we establish an almost monotonicity formula for the frequency function. As a consequence, we derive a quantitative unique continuation result for solutions to the fourth-order subelliptic equation.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Baouendi-Grushin型次椭圆算子Δ_X的四阶方程Δ_X²u=Vu的定量唯一延拓性质，其中V是有界势函数且满足特定梯度条件。通过改进Almgren方法建立了频率函数的几乎单调性公式，从而得到了该四阶次椭圆方程的定量唯一延拓结果。
AI.motivation: 研究Baouendi-Grushin型次椭圆算子的定量唯一延拓性质，这类算子在几何分析和偏微分方程理论中具有重要应用。特别关注四阶方程的情况，旨在建立类似Almgren频率函数方法的定量结果。
AI.method: 通过改进Almgren方法，建立了频率函数的几乎单调性公式。该方法适用于处理Baouendi-Grushin型次椭圆算子Δ_X = Δ_x + |x|^{2β}Δ_y，其中0<β≤1，并考虑了满足特定梯度条件的势函数V。
AI.result: 成功建立了频率函数的几乎单调性公式，并由此推导出了四阶次椭圆方程Δ_X²u=Vu的定量唯一延拓结果。这一结果扩展了经典椭圆方程唯一延拓理论到次椭圆情形。
AI.conclusion: 本文发展了一种适用于Baouendi-Grushin型次椭圆算子的定量唯一延拓理论，通过建立频率函数的几乎单调性，为四阶次椭圆方程提供了有效的定量分析工具，丰富了次椭圆偏微分方程理论的研究内容。

title: Well-posedness to nonlinear Schrödinger-Gerdjikov-Ivanon equation
summary: The Riemann-Hilbert approach is extended to discuss the well-posedness of the nonlinear Schrödinger-Gerdjikov-Ivanon equation. The Lipschitz continuity of potential in $H^{2}(\mathbb{R})\cap H^{1,1}(\mathbb{R})$ to scattering data is obtained through direct scattering transform. Two Riemann-Hilbert problems are constructed, and two sets of the reflection coefficients, that is $r(k)$ and $r_\pm(z)$, are introduced. The Lipschitz continuity from the reflection coefficients $r_\pm(z)$ in $H^{1}(\mathbb{R})\cap L^{2,1}(\mathbb{R})$ to the potential is estimated via the potential reconstruction. Existence of global solutions of NLS-GI equation is considered by the Riemann-Hilbert problem without eigenvalues or resonances.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了Riemann-Hilbert方法研究非线性Schrödinger-Gerdjikov-Ivanon方程的适定性，通过直接散射变换获得势函数到散射数据的Lipschitz连续性，构造了两个Riemann-Hilbert问题，并证明了无特征值或共振情况下全局解的存在性。
AI.motivation: 研究非线性Schrödinger-Gerdjikov-Ivanon方程的适定性问题，通过Riemann-Hilbert方法建立势函数与散射数据之间的连续性关系。
AI.method: 扩展Riemann-Hilbert方法，使用直接散射变换分析势函数到散射数据的Lipschitz连续性，构造两个Riemann-Hilbert问题并引入两组反射系数，通过势重构估计反射系数到势函数的Lipschitz连续性。
AI.result: 获得了势函数在H²(ℝ)∩H¹,¹(ℝ)空间到散射数据的Lipschitz连续性，以及反射系数在H¹(ℝ)∩L²,¹(ℝ)空间到势函数的Lipschitz连续性估计，证明了无特征值或共振情况下NLS-GI方程全局解的存在性。
AI.conclusion: Riemann-Hilbert方法成功应用于NLS-GI方程的适定性分析，建立了势函数与散射数据之间的连续性关系，为研究此类非线性方程提供了有效的分析工具。

title: Expanding Solutions to Free Boundary 3D Spherically Symmetric Compressible Navier-Stokes-Poisson Equations near the Lane-Emden Stars
summary: We consider the gravitational Navier-Stokes-Poisson equations with the equation of state $P(ρ)=Kρ^γ$, where $γ\in(\frac{6}{5},\frac{4}{3}]$, which models the viscous polytropic gaseous stars. We prove the existence of global weak solutions to the equations with constant viscosity and radially symmetric initial data. For $γ=\frac{4}{3}$, we require the initial data having mass less than the mass of the Lane-Emden stars; for $γ\in(\frac{6}{5},\frac{4}{3})$, we require that the initial data belong to an invariant set where initial initial data can be taken near the Lane-Emden stars. For $γ\in(\frac{6}{5},\frac{4}{3})$, we show that the invariant set contains some initial data that are not allowed in previous literature. We also prove the support of any strong solution expands to infinity for the Navier-Stokes-Poisson equations with constant viscosity and a class of density-dependent viscosity, which indicates the strong instability of Lane-Emden solutions for the Navier-Stokes-Poisson equations.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了具有状态方程P(ρ)=Kρ^γ（γ∈(6/5,4/3]）的引力Navier-Stokes-Poisson方程，证明了在恒定粘性和径向对称初始数据下全局弱解的存在性，并分析了Lane-Emden解的不稳定性。
AI.motivation: 研究粘性多方气体恒星的数学模型，特别是分析在引力作用下粘性流体方程的全局解存在性和稳定性问题，填补了γ∈(6/5,4/3)范围内初始数据研究的空白。
AI.method: 使用数学分析方法，针对不同γ值范围分别处理：对于γ=4/3要求初始质量小于Lane-Emden星质量；对于γ∈(6/5,4/3)构造不变集，证明其中包含先前文献不允许的初始数据。同时分析强解支撑集向无穷大扩展的性质。
AI.result: 证明了在恒定粘性和径向对称初始数据下全局弱解的存在性；对于γ∈(6/5,4/3)构造的不变集包含新的初始数据类型；证明了强解的支撑集扩展到无穷大，表明Lane-Emden解在Navier-Stokes-Poisson方程中的强不稳定性。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功建立了粘性多方气体恒星模型的数学理论基础，扩展了初始数据的允许范围，并揭示了Lane-Emden解在粘性情况下的不稳定性，为相关天体物理现象提供了严格的数学描述。

title: On the Reverse Inequality of Riesz transform on metric cone with potential
summary:
Let $M=(0,\infty)_r\times Y$ be a $d$-dimensional ($d\ge 3$) metric cone with metric
$g=dr^2+r^2h$, where $(Y,h)$ is a closed Riemannian manifold. Let
$H=Δ+V_0/r^2$ be the associated Schrodinger operator, with
$V_0\in C^\infty(Y)$ satisfying the positivity condition
$Δ_Y+V_0+(d-2)^2/4>0$. First, we complement previous results by proving
Lorentz-type endpoint estimates for the Riesz transform $\nabla H^{-1/2}$:
it is of restricted weak type at both endpoints of its $L^p$-boundedness range.
Second, we establish the sharp reverse inequality
$\|H^{1/2}f\|_{L^p}\le C\big(\|\nabla f\|_{L^p}+\|f/r\|_{L^p}\big)$
which holds if and only if
\[
\frac{d}{\min\big((d+4)/2+μ_0,\,d\big)}
< p <
\frac{d}{\max\big((d-2)/2-μ_0,\,0\big)}.\]

AI.tldr: 本文研究了度量锥上的Schrödinger算子，证明了Riesz变换的Lorentz型端点估计，并建立了关于H^{1/2}的尖锐反向不等式。
AI.motivation: 研究度量锥上Schrödinger算子的Riesz变换和H^{1/2}算子的有界性，特别是在L^p空间的端点行为，这有助于理解锥形流形上调和分析的性质。
AI.method: 使用调和分析技术，特别是Lorentz空间理论和端点估计方法，分析度量锥上Schrödinger算子的性质。
AI.result: 证明了Riesz变换在其L^p有界范围内的两个端点处都是限制弱型的，并建立了H^{1/2}算子的尖锐反向不等式，给出了该不等式成立的充要p值范围。
AI.conclusion: 在度量锥流形上，Schrödinger算子的Riesz变换具有特定的端点行为，而H^{1/2}算子的反向不等式成立范围由维度和势能参数μ_0共同决定。

title: Emergent behaviors of relativistic thermodynamic flocks with Synge energy
summary: Collective motion and self-organization of interacting particles, such as flocking and swarming, can be viewed as nonequilibrium analogues of collective dynamics in gases. Motivated by the analogy between gas mixtures and Cucker--Smale models, we introduce a polyatomic classical model and its relativistic counterpart based on the Synge energy, and analyze their large-time behavior. The relativistic formulation provides a physically consistent setting for multi-species systems where inertia and internal energy depend on temperature, as occurs in astrophysical plasmas or relativistic fluids. Using the entropy principle, we derive uniform lower bounds for temperature and establish asymptotic flocking under various communication kernels. For nearly constant interactions, flocking emerges from arbitrary initial data. The results clarify how thermodynamic effects and relativistic corrections modify the emergence of coherent motion in particle systems, bridging kinetic theory, relativistic fluid mixtures, and collective dynamics.

AI.tldr: 基于气体混合物与Cucker-Smale模型的类比，提出了多原子经典模型及其相对论对应模型，分析了它们的大时间行为。相对论公式为多物种系统提供了物理一致的框架，使用熵原理推导了温度的一致下界，并在各种通信核下建立了渐近聚集。
AI.motivation: 受气体混合物与Cucker-Smale模型类比的启发，研究粒子集体运动和自组织现象，如聚集和群集，作为气体集体动力学的非平衡类比。特别关注天体物理等离子体或相对论流体中惯性和内能随温度变化的多物种系统。
AI.method: 引入基于Synge能量的多原子经典模型及其相对论对应模型。使用熵原理推导温度的一致下界，分析在各种通信核下的渐近聚集行为。对于近似恒定相互作用的情况，研究从任意初始数据出现的聚集现象。
AI.result: 建立了温度的一致下界，证明了在各种通信核下系统会出现渐近聚集。对于近似恒定相互作用，从任意初始数据都能出现聚集现象。
AI.conclusion: 结果阐明了热力学效应和相对论修正如何改变粒子系统中相干运动的出现，连接了动力学理论、相对论流体混合物和集体动力学。

title: Classical limit of the relativistic Vlasov-Maxwell-Landau system
summary: The physical essence of the non-relativistic limit, from the relativistic Vlasov-Maxwell-Landau system to the Vlasov-Poisson-Landau system, lies in the transition from finite-speed electromagnetic waves to instantaneous Coulomb interactions, and from relativistic to Newtonian particle dynamics. We rigorously justify this limit (mathematically corresponding to the light speed $c \to \infty$) in a periodic box via three key technical advances: establishing a uniform-in-$c$ coercivity estimate for the relativistic Landau collision operator, constructing a novel weighted energy functional to overcome the weakening dissipation of the electromagnetic field at large $c$, and proving a corresponding global well-posedness result.

AI.tldr: 本文严格证明了从相对论性Vlasov-Maxwell-Landau系统到非相对论性Vlasov-Poisson-Landau系统的极限过渡，对应光速c→∞的数学极限。
AI.motivation: 研究非相对论极限的物理本质：从有限速度的电磁波传播过渡到瞬时库仑相互作用，以及从相对论性粒子动力学过渡到牛顿粒子动力学。
AI.method: 通过三项关键技术进展：建立相对论Landau碰撞算子的统一c-强制性估计，构建新的加权能量泛函以克服大c时电磁场耗散减弱的问题，并证明相应的全局适定性结果。
AI.result: 在周期盒中严格证明了该极限过渡的数学正确性。
AI.conclusion: 成功验证了从相对论到非相对论物理系统的极限过渡，为理解不同物理尺度下的动力学行为提供了严格的数学基础。

title: A note on multiple solutions for Kirchhoff-type equations with a Neumann condition
summary: Using as a main tool our recent result on the strict minimax inequality proved in [5], in this note we establish a multiplicity theorem for a problem of the type $$\cases{-K\left(\int_Ω|\nabla u(x)|^2dx\right)Δu = h(x,u) & in $Ω$\cr & \cr {{\partial u}\over {\partialν}}=0 & on $\partialΩ$.\cr}$$

AI.tldr: 本文基于严格极小极大不等式，建立了Neumann边界条件下非线性椭圆方程的多重解存在性定理
AI.motivation: 研究具有非线性项的椭圆方程在Neumann边界条件下的多重解存在性问题
AI.method: 使用作者在[5]中证明的严格极小极大不等式作为主要工具
AI.result: 建立了该非线性椭圆方程的多重解存在性定理
AI.conclusion: 严格极小极大不等式是研究此类问题多重解的有效工具

title: Sharp uniform-in-diffusivity mixing rates for passive scalars in parallel shear flows
summary: We consider the advection-diffusion equation describing the evolution of a passive scalar in a background shear flow. We prove the optimal uniform-in-diffusivity mixing rate $\| f \|_{H^{-1}} \lesssim \langle t \rangle^{-1/(N+1)}$, $t \geq 0$, where $N$ is the maximal order of vanishing of the derivative $b'(y)$ of the shear profile, e.g., $N=1$ for plane Pouseille flow. Our proof is based on the description of the solution in terms of resolvents and involves pointwise estimates on the resolvent kernel. In the non-degenerate case, we further give a rigorous asymptotic description of generic solutions in terms of shear layers localized around the critical points. This verifies formal asymptotics in [McLaughlin-Camassa-Viotti, \textit{Physics of Fluids}, 22(11), 2010].

AI.tldr: 本文研究了背景剪切流中被动标量的平流-扩散方程，证明了与扩散系数无关的最优混合速率，并给出了非退化情况下解的渐近描述。
AI.motivation: 研究剪切流中被动标量的混合行为，特别是在扩散系数很小的情况下，理解混合速率与剪切剖面特性的关系。
AI.method: 基于解的解析描述，使用留数理论和点估计方法，分析解在临界点附近的剪切层结构。
AI.result: 证明了最优混合速率‖f‖_{H^{-1}} ≲ ⟨t⟩^{-1/(N+1)}，其中N是剪切剖面导数b'(y)的消失阶数，并在非退化情况下给出了解的严格渐近描述。
AI.conclusion: 建立了剪切流中被动标量混合的精确数学理论，验证了先前形式渐近分析的正确性，为理解复杂流动中的混合过程提供了理论基础。

title: Desingularization of nondegenerate rotating vortex patches
summary: This paper analyses the space of steady rotating solutions to the two-dimensional incompressible Euler equations nearby vortex patch solutions satisfying a natural nondegeneracy condition. We address the question of desingularization and prove that such vortex patch states are the limit of rotating Euler solutions that are smooth to infinite order, have compact vorticity support, and respect dihedral symmetry. Our nondegeneracy condition is proved to be satisfied by Kirchhoff ellipses and along the local bifurcation curves emanating from the Rankine vortex. The construction, that is based on a local stream function formulation in a tubular neighborhood of the patch boundary, is a synthesis of delicate analysis on thin domains, nonlinear a priori estimates, and a custom version of Newton's method. Our techniques are robust enough to additionally allow us to construct exotic families of singular rotating vortex patch-like solutions nearby a given nondegenerate state. To the best of the authors' knowledge, this work constitutes the first desingularization procedure applicable to general families of steady rotating vortex patches.

AI.tldr: 本文分析了二维不可压缩欧拉方程在满足自然非退化条件的涡斑解附近的稳态旋转解空间，证明了涡斑状态是无限阶光滑、具有紧致涡量支撑且保持二面对称性的旋转欧拉解的极限。
AI.motivation: 研究涡斑解的去奇异性问题，证明涡斑状态可以作为光滑旋转欧拉解的极限，这是首个适用于一般稳态旋转涡斑族的去奇异性方法。
AI.method: 基于涡斑边界管状邻域中的局部流函数公式化，结合薄域上的精细分析、非线性先验估计和定制版本的牛顿法。
AI.result: 证明了在满足非退化条件的涡斑解附近存在无限阶光滑的旋转欧拉解，且该非退化条件对Kirchhoff椭圆和从Rankine涡旋发出的局部分支曲线成立。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了涡斑解的去奇异性过程，证明了涡斑状态可以作为光滑旋转欧拉解的极限，并且该方法足够鲁棒以构造奇异旋转涡斑状解族。

title: Quantitative Stability of Two Weakly Interacting Kinks in the Stationary phi^6 Model
summary: We study the stationary phi^6 model given by the equation -phi''(x) + 2 phi(x) - 8 phi(x)^3 + 6 phi(x)^5 = 0 for x in R, and establish sharp quantitative stability estimates for configurations close to two weakly interacting kinks. More precisely, there exist constants a > 0 and epsilon > 0 such that, for any function u in L-infinity satisfying || u - H_{0,1}(x + x1) - H_{-1,0}(x + x2) ||_{H1} < epsilon with x2 - x1 > a, there exist constants y1, y2 such that || u - H_{0,1}(x + y1) - H_{-1,0}(x + y2) ||_{H1} + exp(-sqrt(2) (y2 - y1)) <= C * || u'' - 2 u + 8 u^3 - 6 u^5 ||_{L2}.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了φ^6模型的稳定性，建立了两个弱相互作用扭结构型附近的定量稳定性估计，证明了当函数接近两个分离的扭结时，存在位置调整使得误差受控于残差范数。
AI.motivation: 研究φ^6模型中扭结构型的稳定性问题，特别是两个弱相互作用扭结的定量稳定性，这对于理解非线性场论中孤立子的稳定性具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过分析φ^6模型的静态方程，使用H1范数和L2范数来量化函数与扭结构型之间的接近程度，建立包含指数衰减项的稳定性不等式。
AI.result: 证明了存在常数a>0和ε>0，使得当函数u与两个分离扭结的H1距离小于ε时，存在位置调整后的扭结使得组合误差受控于残差范数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为φ^6模型中扭结构型的稳定性提供了严格的数学证明，建立了定量稳定性估计，对非线性场论中孤立子稳定性的理解有重要贡献。

title: A direct proof of the equivalence between Dirichlet's principle and Perron's method
summary:
We give a short proof that for a bounded domain $Ω\subset\mathbb{R}^n$ and continuous boundary data $g\in C(\partialΩ)$ admitting a continuous finite-energy extension $φ\in H^{1}(Ω)\cap C(\barΩ)$, the minimizer of the Dirichlet energy \[
  E(v) = \int_Ω |\nabla v|^{2}\,dx,
  \qquad v-φ\in H^{1}_{0}(Ω), \] coincides with the Perron solution $h_g$ of the Dirichlet problem $Δu = 0$ in $Ω$ with boundary data $g$. The argument stays entirely in $H^{1}(Ω)$ and uses only strong convergence via strict convexity of the Dirichlet energy, Friedrichs' inequality, Weyl's lemma, and Wiener's exhaustion by regular subdomains. No weak convergence, Poisson problems with distributional right hand sides, or general elliptic theory are needed.

AI.tldr: 本文给出了一个简短证明：对于有界域Ω和允许连续有限能量扩展的边界数据g，Dirichlet能量的最小化解与Dirichlet问题的Perron解一致。
AI.motivation: 传统证明Dirichlet能量最小化解与Perron解一致的方法通常需要弱收敛、分布理论或一般椭圆理论，本文旨在提供一个更简洁直接的证明。
AI.method: 使用严格凸性、Friedrichs不等式、Weyl引理和Wiener正则子域穷竭法，完全在H¹(Ω)空间内通过强收敛进行证明。
AI.result: 成功证明了Dirichlet能量最小化解与Perron解h_g的一致性，无需使用弱收敛、分布理论或一般椭圆理论。
AI.conclusion: 提供了一个简洁且自包含的证明方法，仅使用基本分析工具即可建立Dirichlet能量最小化解与Perron解之间的等价关系。

title: Elastic scattering by locally rough interfaces
summary: In this paper, we present the first well-posedness result for elastic scattering by locally rough interfaces in both two and three dimensions. Inspired by the Helmholtz decomposition, we first discover a fundamental identity for the stress vector, revealing an intrinsic relationship among the generalized stress vector, the Lame constants and certain tangential differential operators. This identity leads to two key limits for surface integrals involving scattered solutions, from which we deduce the first uniqueness result of direct problem for all frequencies. Through a detailed analysis, applying the steepest descent method, subsequently we derive the existence and uniqueness of the corresponding two-layered Green's tensor along with its explicit expression when the transmission coefficient equals 1. Finally, by leveraging properties of the Green's tensor, we establish the existence of solutions via the variational method and the boundary integral equation, thereby achieving the first well-posedness result for elastic scattering by rough interfaces.

AI.tldr: 本文首次证明了二维和三维弹性波在局部粗糙界面散射问题的适定性，通过发现应力向量的基本恒等式，推导出关键极限，建立了直接问题的唯一性，并最终通过变分方法和边界积分方程证明了解的存在性。
AI.motivation: 弹性波在粗糙界面上的散射问题在理论和应用中都很重要，但之前缺乏完整的适定性结果。本文旨在填补这一空白，为弹性散射理论建立严格的数学基础。
AI.method: 采用Helmholtz分解思想，发现应力向量的基本恒等式；利用最速下降法分析两层Green张量；结合变分方法和边界积分方程证明解的存在性。
AI.result: 首次建立了弹性波在局部粗糙界面散射问题的适定性结果；推导出应力向量的关键恒等式；证明了直接问题的唯一性；给出了两层Green张量的显式表达式。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功建立了弹性波在粗糙界面散射问题的完整数学理论框架，为后续相关研究提供了理论基础和方法工具。

title: Recovering discontinuous viscosity coefficients for inverse Stokes problems by boundary measurements
summary: In this paper, we investigate the inverse Stokes problem of determining a discontinuous viscosity coefficient $μ$ in a bounded domain $Ω\subset\mathbb{R}^3$. By analyzing the singularity of the Dirichlet Green's functions in $H^1$-norm and constructing a specifically coupled Stokes-Brinkman system in a localized domain, we prove a global uniqueness theorem that the viscosity coefficient $μ$ can be uniquely determined from boundary measurements.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了三维有界域中确定不连续粘度系数μ的逆Stokes问题，通过分析Dirichlet Green函数在H1范数下的奇异性，证明了从边界测量可以唯一确定粘度系数μ。
AI.motivation: 研究逆Stokes问题中不连续粘度系数的唯一确定性问题，这对于理解流体力学中的参数识别具有重要意义。
AI.method: 通过分析Dirichlet Green函数在H1范数下的奇异性，并在局部化域中构造特定的耦合Stokes-Brinkman系统。
AI.result: 证明了全局唯一性定理，即粘度系数μ可以从边界测量中唯一确定。
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功解决了三维有界域中不连续粘度系数的逆Stokes问题，为流体参数识别提供了理论保证。

title: Local-in-time existence of strong solutions to a class of compressible Power-Law flows
summary: We consider a model of the compressible non-Newtonian fluids for power-law flow fulfilling a periodic domain in ${\mathbb R}^3,$ in which the extra stress tensor is induced by a potential with $p(t,x)$-structure. The local-in-time existence of strong solution is proved for all $\frac{7}{5} < \inf p(t,x) \leqslant \sup p(t,x) \leqslant 2.$ Further, an improved blow-up criterion for strong solutions is given in terms of the $L^\infty(0,T;L^3(Ω))$-norm of the gradient of the velocity.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了满足周期性边界条件的可压缩非牛顿幂律流体模型，其中额外应力张量由具有p(t,x)结构的势函数诱导。证明了当7/5 < inf p(t,x) ≤ sup p(t,x) ≤ 2时强解的局部存在性，并给出了基于速度梯度L∞(0,T;L3(Ω))范数的改进爆破准则。
AI.motivation: 研究可压缩非牛顿流体在变指数p(t,x)结构下的强解存在性和爆破行为，这类模型在工程和物理应用中具有重要意义，但数学分析较为复杂。
AI.method: 采用数学分析方法，研究具有p(t,x)结构的幂律流体模型，在周期性边界条件下分析强解的局部存在性和爆破准则。
AI.result: 证明了当指数p(t,x)满足7/5 < inf p(t,x) ≤ sup p(t,x) ≤ 2时，强解在局部时间内存在；并建立了基于速度梯度L∞(0,T;L3(Ω))范数的改进爆破准则。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为可压缩非牛顿幂律流体在变指数结构下的数学理论提供了重要进展，建立了强解存在性和爆破行为的严格数学框架。

title: H{ö}lder regularity of parabolic equations with Dirichlet boundary conditions and application to reaction-diffusion and reaction-cross-diffusion systems
summary: In this work, we adapt our recent article [BDD25] to the setting of Dirichlet boundary conditions. A key part is the study of the parabolic equation $a\partial_t w - Δw = f$ with a rough coefficient $a$, homogeneous Dirichlet boundary conditions, and the special assumption $\partial_tw \ge 0$. We then apply it to prove existence of global strong solutions to the triangular Shigesada-Kawasaki-Teramoto (SKT) cross-diffusion system with Lotka-Volterra reaction terms in three dimensions and Dirichlet boundary conditions, and to obtain estimates for solutions to reaction-diffusion systems modeling reversible chemistry (still when Dirichlet boundary conditions are considered).

AI.tldr: 将[BDD25]的方法扩展到Dirichlet边界条件，研究粗糙系数抛物方程，并应用于SKT交叉扩散系统和可逆化学反应扩散系统的强解存在性和估计
AI.motivation: 将已有的研究成果扩展到Dirichlet边界条件，为更广泛的偏微分方程系统提供理论分析工具
AI.method: 研究粗糙系数抛物方程$a\partial_t w - \Delta w = f$在Dirichlet边界条件和$\partial_tw \ge 0$假设下的性质，然后将结果应用于交叉扩散系统和反应扩散系统
AI.result: 证明了三维空间中SKT交叉扩散系统全局强解的存在性，并获得了可逆化学反应扩散系统解的估计
AI.conclusion: 该方法成功地将[BDD25]的结果扩展到Dirichlet边界条件，为相关偏微分方程系统提供了有效的分析框架

title: The local Turnpike Property in Mean Field Control and Games with quadratic Hamiltonian
summary: We study the local stability properties of solutions to ergodic and discounted mean field games systems in the long time horizon, around stationary equilibria, when the Hamiltonian is quadratic. We replace the usual monotonicity of the coupling term with a weaker, local assumption on the stationary equilibrium (that need not be unique), stemming from a second-order strict positivity condition. This new stability assumption, together with a symmetry property of the system, allows us to derive an exponential turnpike property for those solutions that are close to the stationary one. Finally, through a fixed-point argument, we establish the actual existence of stable solutions, both on the finite horizon $[0,T]$ and on the infinite horizon, provided that the initial (and terminal) data are close enough to the stationary equilibrium.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在二次哈密顿量下，遍历和折扣平均场博弈系统在长时间范围内的局部稳定性，围绕稳态均衡点，用较弱的局部假设替代了通常的耦合项单调性。
AI.motivation: 研究平均场博弈系统在长时间范围内的稳定性，特别是当哈密顿量为二次型时，探索在较弱假设下系统的局部稳定性性质。
AI.method: 使用二阶严格正定性条件作为新的稳定性假设，结合系统的对称性，推导出接近稳态解的解的指数转向性质，并通过不动点论证建立稳定解的存在性。
AI.result: 证明了在初始和终端数据足够接近稳态均衡时，在有限时间区间[0,T]和无限时间区间上存在稳定的解，并建立了指数转向性质。
AI.conclusion: 在二次哈密顿量和较弱局部假设下，平均场博弈系统在长时间范围内具有局部稳定性，且存在接近稳态均衡的稳定解。

title: Self-Similar Radially Symmetric Solutions of the Relativistic Euler Equations with Synge Energy
summary: We consider self-similar, radially symmetric solutions of the relativistic Euler equations with constitutive relations from relativistic kinetic theory, based on Synge energies for monatomic and its extension to diatomic gases. For the corresponding initial--boundary value problem, including the spherical piston problem, we prove existence and uniqueness of solutions valid for all values of the relativistic parameter $γ= mc^{2}/(k_{B}T)$, thus covering both the classical limit $(γ\to \infty)$ and the ultra-relativistic regime $(γ\to 0)$. We further establish key structural properties of Synge energies, showing the strict negativity of the second derivative with respect to pressure at constant entropy and the monotone dependence of the characteristic velocity on $γ$. These results extend the classical theory of self-similar flows to the relativistic framework with kinetic-theory-based constitutive equations.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了相对论欧拉方程的自相似径向对称解，基于单原子和双原子气体的Synge能量本构关系。证明了包括球形活塞问题在内的初边值问题解的存在唯一性，覆盖了经典极限和超相对论区域，并建立了Synge能量的关键结构性质。
AI.motivation: 将经典的自相似流理论扩展到相对论框架，使用基于动理学理论的本构方程，研究相对论参数γ从经典极限到超相对论区域的全范围行为。
AI.method: 采用自相似径向对称解方法，分析相对论欧拉方程，基于Synge能量的本构关系，研究单原子和双原子气体，包括球形活塞问题的初边值问题。
AI.result: 证明了在相对论参数γ的所有取值下解的存在唯一性，建立了Synge能量关于压力二阶导数的严格负性和特征速度对γ的单调依赖性等关键结构性质。
AI.conclusion: 成功将经典自相似流理论扩展到相对论框架，为基于动理学本构关系的相对论流体动力学提供了完整的数学理论框架。

title: Long-time behavior of resonant time-dependent perturbations of periodic transport equations on $\mathbb{R}$
summary: We consider linear, time-dependent and skew-adjoint perturbations of periodic transport equations on the one-dimensional torus. We describe the long-time behavior of solutions for all non-degenerate perturbations in resonant regime, proving that either there exist solutions whose Sobolev norms explode exponentially fast, provoking energy transfer phenomena, or all solutions remain stable for arbitrarily long time scales. The proof combines pseudodifferential tools with dynamical systems results: we perform a resonant normal form procedure to reduce our analysis to the classical dynamics for the resonant equation. The main difficulty lies in the proof of the instability result, for which we explicitly construct an escape function associated to the dynamics. This is obtained by means of a positive commutator estimate on the operator associated with the escape function, exploiting microlocal analysis.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了环面上线性、时间相关且斜伴随的周期性输运方程扰动，描述了共振区域中所有非退化扰动的长时间行为，证明了要么存在Sobolev范数指数级增长的解，要么所有解在任意长时间尺度上保持稳定。
AI.motivation: 研究周期性输运方程在扰动下的长时间行为，特别是共振区域中解的稳定性与不稳定性问题，探索能量转移现象。
AI.method: 结合伪微分工具与动力系统结果，通过共振正规形程序将分析简化为共振方程的经典动力学，利用微局部分析构造逃逸函数并应用正交换子估计。
AI.result: 证明了在共振区域中，要么存在Sobolev范数指数级爆炸的解（能量转移现象），要么所有解在任意长时间尺度上保持稳定。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为周期性输运方程在扰动下的长时间行为提供了完整的描述，揭示了共振区域中解的稳定性与不稳定性之间的二分现象。

title: Optimal regularity results for the Stokes--Dirichlet problem
summary: We develop a sharp maximal regularity theory for the resolvent and evolution Stokes equations with no-slip boundary conditions, focusing on bounded domains of low regularity. Our framework covers the full scales of Besov and Sobolev spaces, $B^s_{p,q}$ and $H^{s,p}$, including endpoint cases such as $L^\infty$. Our approach also allows extending the classical $L^p$-theory for $1\leqslant p\leqslant\infty$, giving a complete picture that includes both Bessel potential spaces $H^{s,p}$ and Besov spaces $B^s_{p,q}$, $p,q\in[1,\infty]$.\\ Our first main result establishes resolvent estimates in the half-space encompassing endpoint function spaces, while the second addresses bounded domains of minimal boundary regularity. In both cases we derive resolvent bounds, prove boundedness of the $\mathbf{H}^\infty$-functional calculus for the Stokes--Dirichlet operator, and characterize precisely the domains of its fractional powers.\\ In the half space setting, we work with homogeneous Sobolev and Besov spaces following the notion due to Bahouri, Chemin and Danchin, further refined by the second author. The analysis of solenoidal function spaces provides here a complete toolkit for the study of incompressible fluid flows. As a consequence of our analysis, we obtain an explicit description for the Stokes--Dirichlet operator on $L^\infty(\mathbb R^n_+)$, which seems completely new.\\ For bounded domains, we obtain sharp results for a wide class of rough domains under minimal assumptions on boundary regularity. To this end, we rely on Sobolev multiplier theory. The assumptions coincide with those of Maz'ya--Shaposhnikova, already shown to be optimal in the case of the Laplace equation with Dirichlet boundary conditions.

AI.tldr: 本文发展了低正则性有界域上无滑移边界条件Stokes方程的分辨率和演化问题的尖锐极大正则性理论，覆盖了Besov和Sobolev空间的完整尺度，包括端点情况如L∞空间。
AI.motivation: 现有Stokes方程理论在低正则性边界域和端点函数空间方面存在局限，需要建立完整的正则性理论框架来覆盖Besov和Sobolev空间的完整尺度。
AI.method: 在半空间中使用齐次Sobolev和Besov空间方法，在有界域中依赖Sobolev乘子理论，在最小边界正则性假设下工作。
AI.result: 建立了半空间和有界域中的分辨率估计，证明了Stokes-Dirichlet算子的有界H∞-泛函演算，精确刻画了其分数幂的域，并获得了L∞空间上Stokes-Dirichlet算子的显式描述。
AI.conclusion: 为研究不可压缩流体流动提供了完整的工具包，在最小边界正则性假设下获得了粗糙域类的尖锐结果，这些假设与Maz'ya-Shaposhnikova的最优条件一致。

title: On the problem of stability of viscous shocks
summary: We consider the problem of spectral stability of traveling wave solutions $u=γ(x-Wt)$ for a system of viscous conservation laws $\partial_t u + \partial_x F(u) = \partial^2_x u$. Such solutions correspond to heteroclinic trajectories $γ$ of a system of ODE. In general conditions of stability can be obtained only numerically. We propose a model class of piece-wise linear (discontinuous) vector fields $F$ for which the stability problem is reduced to a linear algebra problem. We show that the stability problem makes sense in such low regularity and construct several examples of stability loss. Every such example can be smoothed to provide a smooth example of the same phenomenon.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了粘性守恒律系统中行波解的谱稳定性问题，提出了分段线性向量场模型将稳定性分析简化为线性代数问题，并构造了稳定性丧失的示例。
AI.motivation: 粘性守恒律系统的行波解稳定性通常只能数值分析，需要发展可解析处理的模型来理解稳定性机制。
AI.method: 使用分段线性（不连续）向量场F，将稳定性问题转化为线性代数问题，并在低正则性下定义稳定性问题。
AI.result: 构造了多个稳定性丧失的示例，这些示例可以通过平滑化得到光滑向量场下的相同现象。
AI.conclusion: 分段线性模型为粘性守恒律系统行波解的谱稳定性分析提供了有效的解析框架，能够揭示稳定性丧失的机制。

title: Normalized solutions for the nonlinear Schrödinger equation with trapping potential
summary: We study the existence and multiplicity of positive normalized solutions with prescribed $L^{2}$-norm for the Sobolev critical Schrödinger equation $-ΔU + V(x) U = λU + |U|^{2^*-2} U$ in $\mathbb{R}^N$, $\int_{\mathbb{R}^N} U^2\,dx = ρ^2$, where $N \ge 3$, $V\ge 0$ is a trapping potential, $λ\in \mathbb{R}$ and $2^*=\frac{2N}{N-2}$. Our first result is that the existence of local minimum solutions for $ρ\in (0, ρ^*)$, for some suitable $ρ^* > 0$, under appropriate assumptions on the potential. These solutions correspond to ground states. Our second result concerns the existence of mountain pass solutions, under the same assumptions.

AI.tldr: 研究带L2范数约束的Sobolev临界Schrödinger方程正归一化解的存在性和多重性，在陷阱势场下分别得到局部极小解和山路解。
AI.motivation: 研究带L2范数约束的临界Schrödinger方程在陷阱势场下的归一化解，这类问题在量子力学和Bose-Einstein凝聚中有重要应用。
AI.method: 使用变分方法，在L2范数约束下寻找临界点，分别构造局部极小解和山路解。
AI.result: 证明了在适当假设下，对于ρ∈(0,ρ*)存在局部极小解（基态解），以及山路解的存在性。
AI.conclusion: 在陷阱势场和L2范数约束下，Sobolev临界Schrödinger方程存在多种类型的正归一化解。

title: Flat flows of periodic Lipschitz subgraphs for generalized nonlocal perimeters
summary: We prove the existence and the 1/2-Hölder continuity in time of flat flows for periodic Lipschitz subgraphs, whose evolution is governed by the gradient flow of generalized nonlocal perimeters. Moreover, we show that the flat flow satisfies the semigroup property and, as a consequence, the generalized perimeter decreases along the evolution. Finally, we prove that halfspaces are global minimizers of the generalized nonlocal perimeters and act as attractors for the dynamics. Our theory covers several generalized perimeters, including fractional and Riesz-type perimeters (defined on entire periodic subgraphs through suitable renormalization procedures) and the Minkowski pre-content.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了广义非局部周长梯度流下周期Lipschitz子图的平坦流的存在性、1/2-Hölder时间连续性、半群性质，并证明半空间是全局极小值点和动力学吸引子。
AI.motivation: 研究广义非局部周长梯度流的动力学行为，特别是平坦流的存在性、正则性和渐近行为，为理解非局部几何演化方程提供理论基础。
AI.method: 通过重整化程序定义在周期子图上的广义非局部周长，包括分数阶和Riesz型周长以及Minkowski预容量，分析其梯度流的平坦流性质。
AI.result: 证明了平坦流的存在性、1/2-Hölder时间连续性、半群性质，广义周长沿演化递减，且半空间是全局极小值点和动力学吸引子。
AI.conclusion: 建立了广义非局部周长梯度流下周期Lipschitz子图演化的完整理论框架，涵盖了分数阶、Riesz型和Minkowski型等多种非局部周长情形。

title: Wigner and Gabor phase-space analysis of propagators for evolution equations
summary:
We study the Wigner kernel and the Gabor matrix associated with the propagators of a broad class
  of linear evolution equations, including the complex heat, wave,
  and Hermite equations. Within the framework of time-frequency analysis, we derive
  explicit expressions for the Wigner kernels of Fourier multipliers and establish quantitative
  decay estimates for the corresponding Gabor matrices. These results are obtained under symbol
  regularity conditions formulated in the Gelfand-Shilov scale and ensure exponential off-diagonal
  decay or quasi-diagonality of the matrix representation. We believe this approach can be extended to more general symbols in the pseudodifferential setting, improving the existing results in terms of their Gabor matrix decay. For the complex heat equation, we obtain closed-form formulas exhibiting both dissipative
  and oscillatory behavior governed respectively by the real and imaginary parts of the diffusion
  parameter. The modulus of the Gabor matrix is shown to display Gaussian decay and temporal
  spreading consistent with diffusion phenomena. In contrast, the complex Hermite equation
  is analyzed via Hörmander's metaplectic semigroup, where the propagator decomposes as the product
  of a real Hermite semigroup and a fractional Fourier transform. In this setting, the Gabor matrix
  retains its Gaussian shape while undergoing a pure rotation on the time-frequency plane,
  reflecting the symplectic structure of the underlying flow.
  The analysis provides a unified operator-theoretic and phase-space perspective on parabolic
  and hyperbolic evolution equations, linking the geometry of their symbols with the
  sparsity and localization properties of their Gabor representations. Explicit formulas are
  given in a form suitable for numerical computation and visualization of phase-space dynamics.

AI.tldr: 本文研究线性演化方程传播子的Wigner核和Gabor矩阵，包括复热方程、波动方程和Hermite方程，在时频分析框架下推导显式表达式和衰减估计。
AI.motivation: 建立统一框架来研究抛物型和双曲型演化方程的相空间动力学，通过Gabor矩阵的稀疏性和局部化特性来理解符号几何与传播子行为之间的关系。
AI.method: 在Gelfand-Shilov尺度下建立符号正则性条件，推导Fourier乘子的Wigner核显式表达式，分析Gabor矩阵的指数衰减特性，利用Hörmander的辛半群理论分析复Hermite方程。
AI.result: 获得了Gabor矩阵的指数非对角衰减或准对角性，复热方程的Gabor矩阵显示高斯衰减和时间扩散，复Hermite方程的Gabor矩阵保持高斯形状并在时频平面上纯旋转。
AI.conclusion: 该方法为抛物型和双曲型演化方程提供了统一的算子理论和相空间视角，将符号几何与Gabor表示的稀疏性和局部化特性联系起来，给出了适合数值计算和相空间动力学可视化的显式公式。

title: On the Fujita Phenomenon for a Forced Spatio-Temporal Fractional Diffusion Equation
summary: We study the Cauchy problem for a semilinear fractional diffusion equation with a time-dependent forcing term: \[ \partial_t^αu + (-Δ)^{\mathsf{s}} u = |u|^p + t^σ\,\mathbf{w}(x), \quad (t,x) \in (0,\infty) \times \mathbb{R}^N, \] with parameters $α, \mathsf{s} \in (0,1)$, $σ> -α$, and a continuous function $\mathbf{w}$. The operator $\partial_t^α$ denotes the Caputo fractional derivative. Our main contributions are threefold. First, we prove the local existence of mild solutions and demonstrate a finite-time blow-up in the subcritical regime, provided $\int_{\mathbb{R}^N} \mathbf{w}(x)\,dx > 0$. Second, for the supercritical case with $-α< σ< 0$, we establish the global existence for sufficiently small initial data and a forcing term, and we determine the critical exponent to be \[ p_F=\frac{Nα-2\mathsf{s}σ}{Nα-2\mathsf{s}(α+σ)}. \] Finally, for this supercritical range, we prove a more robust global existence result under assumptions requiring only local smallness and controlled growth of the data.

AI.tldr: 研究了带有时变强迫项的分数阶扩散方程的柯西问题，证明了局部解存在性和有限时间爆破，确定了临界指数，并建立了全局存在性结果。
AI.motivation: 研究分数阶扩散方程在时变强迫项下的解的行为，特别是局部存在性、爆破现象和全局存在性，以理解非线性项和强迫项之间的相互作用。
AI.method: 使用Caputo分数阶导数算子，分析不同参数范围（亚临界和超临界）下的解的性质，通过数学证明建立局部和全局存在性定理。
AI.result: 在亚临界情况下证明局部解存在且会发生有限时间爆破；在超临界情况下确定临界指数p_F，并证明小初值和强迫项下的全局存在性。
AI.conclusion: 分数阶扩散方程的解行为强烈依赖于参数α、s、σ和非线性指数p，临界指数p_F在区分解的全局存在和爆破中起关键作用。
